title: Ruined our vacation
text: NEVER AGAIN!!! Although the rooms were nicely decorated, the rest of the experience was substandard. Service could not be worse. Black bathrooms with no light. Neighboring rooms had parties going on all around us til dawn. No topsheets on the bed - just a duvet (skeevy!). Tons of Euro-trash and bridge and tunnel wanna-bes prevented us from enjoyed all common areas of the hotel after 8:00 pm. If you are as clueless to think that all of this spells C-O-O-L this is the place for you!
